thread.title: Broadcaster Vin Scully to miss Dodgers postseason, expected to return in 2016
thread.title_full: Broadcaster Vin Scully to miss Dodgers postseason, expected to return in 2016

author: BILL PLUNKETT
title: Broadcaster Vin Scully to miss Dodgers postseason, expected to return in 2016
text:
Broadcaster Vin Scully to miss Dodgers postseason, expected to return in 2016 Oct. 8, 2015 Updated 2:38 p.m. 1 of 1 Broadcaster Vin Scully underwent a medical procedure Thursday and will miss the Dodgers' postseason. DANNY MOLOSHOK, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS By BILL PLUNKETT / STAFF WRITER SEND PDF Broadcaster Vin Scully underwent a medical procedure Thursday and will miss the Dodgers' postseason. DANNY MOLOSHOK, THE ASSOCIATED PRESS 
LOS ANGELES – The Dodgers announced that Hall of Fame broadcaster Vin Scully underwent “a recommended medical procedure” Thursday morning and will not work the post-season. 
No further details were given regarding the procedure. Scully missed the final series of the regular season last weekend as well due to an illness that was described at the time as a cold. Scully missed another game earlier in the season as well. 
Dodgers officials spoke to Scully this week and said he was in good spirits. He is said to be resting comfortably. 
Scully recently announced that he would return for the 2016 season (with a travel schedule yet to be determined) but he expected that to be his final season. That would be an unprecedented 67 th season as a member of the Dodgers’ broadcast crew. 
Scully will turn 88 in late November. Most Popular
